content: --भ्रू {%<ab>a.</ab>%} having beautiful eyebrows. (--भ्रूः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} a lovely woman. ({%<ab>N. B.</ab>%} The vocative singular of this word is strictly सुभ्रूः; but सुभ्रु is used by writers like Bhaṭṭi, Kālidāsa, and Bhavabhūti; हा पितः क्वासि हे सुभ्रु <ls>Bk. 6. 17</ls>; so <ls>V. 3. 22</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 43</ls>; <ls>Māl. 3. 8.</ls>)
